info.description:
This API will return a collection of Recipes for decoration application.

__The base endpoint URL for this API in production is:__ `https://marko.aramark.net/v1`.

For testing the API with the "Try" tool on this page or in your app, use either our testing server "qa-marko" or our development server "dev-marko".
info.title: Recipe Decorations

tags.name: Recipe Decorations
tags.description: Service to provide a collection of Recipes and core attribution for the Front Line Enablement Application.

get.description:
Returns a collection of Recipes for decoration base on Search or Recipe Id.

![This endpoint is in production](/themes/portal/images/statuspngs/statusprod.png)

count.description: Number of records returned in request

size.description: Number of records returned with the result set

recipeIdParam.name: recipe_id
recipeIdParam.description: Unique ID of Recipe from Prima Web

searchParam.name: search
searchParam.description: Sting used to search for recipe by name

isAlsrParam.name: is_alsr
isAlsrParam.description: Indicator of whether alsr is enabled

isMm2Param.name: is_mm2
isMm2Param.description: Indicator of whether Master the Menu 2 or mm2 is enabled

isRetailParam.name: is_retail
isRetailParam.description: Indicator of whether Retail is enabled

isSmiParam.name: is_smi
isSmiParam.description: Indicator of whether smi is enabled

isHarvestTableParam.name: is_harvest_table
isHarvestTableParam.description: Indicator of when recipe is for Harvest Table menu

isPatientParam.name: is_patient
isPatientParam.description: Indicator of when recipe is for patient services

isTrueEatsParam.name: is_true_eats
isTrueEatsParam.description: Indicator of when recipe is for True Eats menu

isResidentialParam.name: is_residential
isResidentialParam.description: Indicator of whether Residential is enabled

fieldsParam.name: fields
fieldsParam.description: Comma delimited list to reduce the fields of response object. When used the property "recipe_id" will always be appended to the list for a consistent field for response testing.

pageParam.name: page
pageParam.description: Page number of data set to return

sizeParam.name: size
sizeParam.description: Number of rows in each page to return.

bypassCacheParam.name: bypass-cache
bypassCacheParam.description: This HTTP Header variable will bypassDo not cache call

smokeParam.name: smoke
smokeParam.description: When set to 'true' this HTTP header variable will route the API call to the Integration testing environment.  Only applicable in QA.

apikey.name: apikey
apikey.description: This HTTP Header variable will verify security

master_system_id.description: ID for the master system source

recipe_id.description: Recipe ID coming from source system Prima Web.

is_alsr.description: Indicator of whether alsr is enabled 'Y/N'

is_mm2.description: Indicator of whether Master the Menu 2 or mm2 is enabled 'Y/N'

is_residential.description: Indicator of whether Recipe is Residential enabled 'Y/N'

is_retail.description: Indicator of whether is Retail enabled 'Y/N'

is_smi.description: Indicator of whether smi is enabled 'Y/N'

is_harvest_table.description: Indicator of when recipe is for Harvest Table menu; 'Y/N'

is_patient.description: Indicator of when recipe is for patient services; 'Y/N'

is_true_eats.description: Indicator of when recipe is for True Eats menu; 'Y/N'
